duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the plan of care for the patient, manage their length of stay, and ensure appropriate resource management.
Develop safe appropriate discharge plans in collaboration with the multidisciplinary team.
Coordinate activities that promote quality outcomes and patient throughput while supporting optimal care and appropriate resource utilization.
Identify cases with potential for high-risk complications and act as an advocate for the individual’s healthcare needs.
Partner with Social Services to ensure post-acute medical needs and level of care are appropriate.

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse with current TX state license required. Associate's Degree required, Bachelor's degree preferred. 2+ years experience in case management or 3+ years experience in clinical nursing required. Certification in case management or utilization review preferred.
